mdRecord.dcterms:title: Crown Prince of Saudi Arabia Making a Recording on the Piazza, January 14, 1947
mdRecord.dcterms:creator: Rowe, Abbie, 1905-1967
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Black and white photographic print of the Crown Prince of Saudi Arabia making a recording on the piazza at Mount Vernon. The photograph is adhered to card stock with a printed caption below: On the porch at Mount Vernon, His Royal Highness makes a recording of his impressions of the United States. Accompanying him are (left to right): His Excellency Fuad Bey Hamza; A. Antar, interpreter; a radio technician; Dr. H. A. Kurani of the Department of State; and His Excellency Assad Al-Faqih.
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Mount Vernon (Va. : Estate)
Mansion
Mansion exterior
Piazza
